downloadTitle: Facility Management Sample for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012
downloadDescription: A sample application that demonstrates developing for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012
detailsSection: Facility Management for Microsoft Dynamics AX 2012 is a developer sample that provides examples of how to implement common functionality in Microsoft Dynamics AX. Use it to learn how you could implement functionality in your integrating applications.
installInstructionSection: Run the installer to extract the sample application. Follow the instructions in the PDF to install and learn about the Facility Management sample application.
